Exercise 3.3.1.3
map a continuous variable to color, size, and shape.
```{r}
ggplot(data = mpg) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy, color = cyl))

ggplot(data = mpg) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy, size = cyl))

ggplot(data = mpg) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy, shape = cyl))


```
